about_the_game:
Meows Farm is a purr-leaseantly chill farming game—but forget boring crops, here you grow CATS!

Once a burnt-out office kitten at MeowHaHa Corp., you spent days gluing synthetic whiskers onto assembly-line cats. But fate had claws—you won a bid to run a magical cat plantation! To truly own this land, you must complete the legendary Meowlogy Handbook by breeding fancy floofs. Grow rare breeds, expand your farm, and build the ultimate feline utopia!

Game Features

🐾 【Cat Research】

Combine basic seeds to grow rare cat seedlings. Transplant these seedlings, nurture them into full-grown cat plants, and harvest "Meow Fruits" to obtain even more seeds. Experiment with planting and synthesis to unlock advanced breeds. Complete the Cat Breed Handbook and earn hidden rewards!

🐾 【Farm Management】

Expand your fields, upgrade tools, and build advanced facilities to boost productivity. Decorate your plantation with charming furniture to restore energy. Earn coins by fulfilling quirky orders or simply playing with your cats—because even naps count as "work" here!

Highlights

✅ Fully playable with 44 cats across 6 rarity tiers!

✅ Seed synthesis, potion crafting, and decoration systems unlocked!

Future Updates

• Build Cat Cottages to house your favorite furry friends.

• Expanded cat interactions—dress them up and unlock their backstories!

• Hire helper sprites to organize your farm’s chaos.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16+
  • Processor: Inter I3-2100 / AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.1
  • Processor: Inter I3-2100 / AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Meows Farm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Inter I3-2100 / AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Meows Farm is a cozy farming sim where you plant magical seeds to grow adorable cats! Unlock advanced feline breeds by crafting seeds, and become the true master of your purr-fect plantation by completing the legendary Meowlogy Handbook!
